ygData.subject: Re: [archive-crawler] Odd behavior --- selective ARC writing
ygData.msgSnippet: I found the problem.  The origin server is returning a content-type of text/html; charset=utf-8 which my regexp doesn t handle... Sorry for the noise.

I found the problem.

<sigh>

The origin server is returning a content-type of

"text/html; charset=utf-8"

which my regexp doesn't handle...

Sorry for the noise.
